success.upload: The image was successfully uploaded to your Google Drive!
success.remove: The image was successfully removed from your Google Drive!

error.upload: The image failed to upload to your Google Drive!
error.drive: Error! Could not get image from Google Drive.
error.amazon: An error occurred! Failed to get the edited image. Therefore an upload to your Google Drive can not be pursued.

info.noValidImages: No valid images (Png, Jpg/Jpeg) found in your Google Drive.

error.invalidFile: Invalid file! The file has to be a Png or Jpg/Jpeg image. Please try again.

success.upload: Image was successfully uploaded to your OneDrive!
